briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_init initializes a TLx493D sensor based on the specified sensor type. It is calling the initialization function of the corresponding sensor, depending on the sensor type that is passed to the function.

detaileddescription.para: Project C includes - common to all sensors

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t structure, which represents the sensor being initialized.
The sensorType parameter is of type TLx493D_SupportedSensorType_t, which is an enumeration representing the supported sensor types for the TLx493D sensor.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_init returns a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_deinit is used to deinitialize a TLx493D sensor. It frees all allocated memory which was allocated through the initialization.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t structure, which represents the sensor being de-initialized.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_deinit returns a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_readRegisters reads registers from a TLx493D sensor. It is reading out the complete register map of the sensor and is saving the current values to the "internal" register map of the sensor object.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_readRegisters is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_getRawTemperature retrieves the raw temperature from a TLx493D sensor. It is reading out the temperature registers of the sensor and is returning its value as LSB.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t structure, which represents the TLx493D sensor.
A pointer to an int16_t variable where the raw temperature value will be stored.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_getRawTemperature is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_getRawMagneticField retrieves the raw magnetic field values from a TLx493D sensor. It is reading the magnetic field value registers of the sensor and is returning them as LSB for the X, Y, Z-direction.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the TLx493D_t structure that represents the sensor.
A pointer to a variable where the raw magnetic field value along the x-axis will be stored.
A pointer to a variable where the raw magnetic field value along the y-axis will be stored.
A pointer to a variable where the raw magnetic field value along the z-axis will be stored.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_getRawMagneticField is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_getRawMagneticFieldAndTemperature retrieves the raw magnetic field and temperature values from a TLx493D sensor. It is reading out the magnetic field value registers, as well as the temperature value registers of the sensor and is returning them as LSB.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the TLx493D_t structure that represents the sensor.
A pointer to a variable where the raw magnetic field value along the x-axis will be stored.
A pointer to a variable where the raw magnetic field value along the y-axis will be stored.
A pointer to a variable where the raw magnetic field value along the z-axis will be stored.
A pointer to a variable where the raw temperature value will be stored.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_getRawMagneticFieldAndTemperature is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_getTemperature retrieves the temperature from a TLx493D sensor in °C. It is reading out the temperature registers of the sensor and converts the values into °C with the formula that is provided in the datasheet of the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.
A pointer to a double variable where the temperature value will be stored in °C.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_getTemperature is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_getMagneticField retrieves the magnetic field values from a TLx493D sensor. It is reading out the magnetic field value registers of the sensor and is converting the retrieved data into values in mT for each magnetic field axis.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.
A pointer to a variable where the magnetic field value in mT along the x-axis will be stored.
A pointer to a variable where the magnetic field value in mT along the y-axis will be stored.
A pointer to a variable where the magnetic field value in mT along the z-axis will be stored.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_getMagneticField is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_getMagneticFieldAndTemperature retrieves the magnetic field and temperature readings from a TLx493D sensor. It combines the two functions tlx493d_getTemperature and tlx493d_getMagneticField in order to have one function which is providing the temperature as well as the magnetic field values of the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the TLx493D_t structure that represents the sensor.
A pointer to a variable where the magnetic field value in mT along the x-axis will be stored.
A pointer to a variable where the magnetic field value in mT along the y-axis will be stored.
A pointer to a variable where the magnetic field value in mT along the z-axis will be stored.
A pointer to a double variable where the temperature value in °C will be stored.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_getMagneticFieldAndTemperature is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_setMeasurement sets the measurement type for a TLx493D sensor. It is writing to the corresponding bitfields in the config-register in order to set the desired measuring mode of the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

The meas parameter is of type TLx493D_MeasurementType_t, which is an enumeration type representing different measurement types for the TLx493D sensor. All available options can be found in the enum TLx493D_MeasurementType_t in the library file tlx493d_types.h.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_setMeasurement is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_setTrigger sets the trigger type for a TLx493D sensor. It is writing to the corresponding bitfields in the config-register in order to set the desired trigger mode of the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the sensor.

The trigger parameter is of type TLx493D_TriggerType_t, which is an enumeration type representing different trigger types for the TLx493D sensor. All the available options can be found in the enum TLx493D_TriggerType_t in the library file tlx493d_types.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_setTrigger is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_setSensitivity sets the sensitivity of a TLx493D sensor. It is writing to the corresponding bitfields in the registers of the sensor in order to set the desired measuring range.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

The range parameter is of type TLx493D_SensitivityType_t, which is an enumeration type that represents the sensitivity range of the sensor. All available options can be found in the enum TLx493D_SensitivityType_tin the library filetlx493d_types`.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_setSensitivity is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_setDefaultConfig sets the default configuration for a TLx493D sensor. It puts the sensor into the 1-Byte-Read-Mode and turns off the interrupt. This is required to guarantee the proper functionality of the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_setDefaultConfig is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_setIICAddress sets the IIC address of a TLx493D sensor. It is writing to the corresponding bitfields of the sensor in order to change the I2C-Default-Address of the sensor to the desired address of the user.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

The addr parameter is of type TLx493D_IICAddressType_t , which is an enumeration type representing the I2C address of the sensor. You can see all available addresses in the enum TLx493D_IICAddressType_t in the library file tlx493d_types.h.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_setIICAddress is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_enableCollisionAvoidance enables collision avoidance for a TLx493D sensor.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_enableCollisionAvoidance is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_disableCollisionAvoidance disables collision avoidance for a TLx493D sensor.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_disableCollisionAvoidance is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_enableInterrupt enables interrupts for a TLx493D sensor.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_enableInterrupt is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_disableInterrupt is used to disable interrupts for a TLx493D sensor.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_disableInterrupt is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_setPowerMode sets the power mode of a TLx493D sensor. It is writing to the corresponding bitfields of the sensor in order to set one of the three available power modes of the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

The mode parameter is of type TLx493D_PowerModeType_t, which is an enumeration type representing different power modes for the TLx493D sensor. All available options can be found in the enum TLx493D_PowerModeType_t in the library file tlx493d_types.h.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_setPowerMode is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_setUpdateRate sets the update rate of a TLx493D sensor. It is writing to the corresponding bitfields of the sensor in order to set the desired update frequency, with which the sensor will update his measured values.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

The rate parameter is of type TLx493D_UpdateRateType_t, which is an enumeration type representing different update rates for the sensor. All available options can be found in the enum TLx493D_UpdateRateType_t in the library file ´tlx493d_types.h`.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_setUpdateRate is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_hasValidData checks if the TLx493D sensor has valid data. It is checking the corresponding bitfield of the sensor which indicates if the acquired measurement data is valid or not.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_hasValidData is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_isFunctional checks if a TLx493D sensor is functional. It checks the internal fuse parity bit as well as the config parity bit in order to confirm that the sensor is still functional.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents a TLx493D sensor.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_isFunctional is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_hasWakeUp checks if a TLx493D sensor has wake-up functionality. It simply checks the bitfield which indicates if the sensor has a wake-up functionality or not.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents a TLx493D sensor.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_hasWakeUp is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_isWakeUpEnabled checks if wake-up mode is enabled for a TLx493D sensor. It checks the bitfield of the sensor which gives you the information if the wake-up is enabled or not.

parameterdescription.para: sensor is a pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents a sensor.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_isWakeUpEnabled is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_enableWakeUpMode enables the wake-up mode for the TLx493D sensor.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_enableWakeUpMode is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_disableWakeUpMode disables the wake-up mode of a TLx493D sensor.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_disableWakeUpMode is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

memberdef.argsstring: (TLx493D_t *sensor, int16_t xl_th, int16_t xh_th, int16_t yl_th, int16_t yh_th, int16_t zl_th, int16_t zh_th)
memberdef.name: tlx493d_setWakeUpThresholdsAsInteger

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_setWakeUpThresholdsAsInteger sets the wake-up thresholds for a TLx493D sensor using integer values. It sets the lower and upper threshold for each of three axis. If one of these thresholds is exceeded the sensor will trigger an interrupt. It will continue to trigger interrupts as long as the threshold is exceeded.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the TLx493D_t structure, which represents the sensor.
The lower threshold value for the magnetic field in x-axis.
The upper threshold value for the magnetic field in x-axis.
The lower threshold value for the magnetic field in y-axis.
The upper threshold value for the magnetic field in y-axis.
The lower threshold value for the magnetic field in z-axis.
The upper threshold value for the magnetic field in z-axis.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_setWakeUpThresholdsAsInteger is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

memberdef.argsstring: (TLx493D_t *sensor, double temperature, double xLow, double xHigh, double yLow, double yHigh, double zLow, double zHigh)
memberdef.name: tlx493d_setWakeUpThresholds

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_setWakeUpThresholds sets the wake-up thresholds for the TLx493D sensor in mT. It sets the lower and upper threshold for each of three axis in mT. If one of these thresholds is exceeded the sensor will trigger an interrupt. It will continue to trigger interrupts as long as the threshold is exceeded.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the TLx493D_t structure, which represents the sensor device.
The temperature to be used for derating the field values.
The lower threshold value for the magnetic field in x-axis.
The upper threshold value for the magnetic field in x-axis.
The lower threshold value for the magnetic field in y-axis.
The upper threshold value for the magnetic field in y-axis.
The lower threshold value for the magnetic field in z-axis.
The upper threshold value for the magnetic field in z-axis.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_setWakeUpThresholds is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error.
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_softwareReset performs a software reset on the TLx493D sensor.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the TLx493D_t structure, which represents the sensor device.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_softwareReset is returning a boolean value.

parameterdescription.para: Error..
Function execution was successful.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_getTypeAsString returns the type of the TLx493D sensor as a string.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t structure, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

simplesect.para: The function tlx493d_getTypeAsString returns a pointer to a constant character string.

memberdef.argsstring: (TLx493D_t *sensor, int16_t rawTemp, TLx493D_SensitivityType_t sens, double xInmT, double yInmT, double zInmT, int16_t *x, int16_t *y, int16_t *z)
memberdef.name: tlx493d_calculateRawMagneticFieldAtTemperature

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_calculateRawMagneticFieldAtTemperature calculates the raw magnetic field at a given temperature.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t structure, which represents the TLx493D sensor.
The raw temperature value obtained from the sensor.

The parameter sens is of type TLx493D_SensitivityType_t, which is an enumeration type representing the sensitivity level of the sensor. It is used to specify the desired sensitivity level for calculating the raw magnetic field.
The parameter xInmT represents the magnetic field strength in Millitesla (mT) along the x-axis.
The parameter yInmT represents the magnetic field strength in Millitesla (mT) along the y-axis.
The parameter zInmT represents the magnetic field strength in Millitesla (mT) along the z-axis.
A pointer to a variable where the calculated raw magnetic field in the x-axis will be stored.
A pointer to a variable where the calculated raw magnetic field in the y-axis will be stored.
A pointer to a variable where the calculated raw magnetic field in the z-axis will be stored.

briefdescription.para: The function tlx493d_printRegisters prints out the internal registers of the sensor object. It can be used to check certain values of the sensor register map.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a TLx493D_t structure, which represents the TLx493D sensor.
